KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_GhostClue_Windmill: Blades that once whirled like a tornado, now lay still among crumbled stone. Find the lost who dwells there, set her free.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_GhostClue_Cave: My brother lies buried in darkness, beneath a southern point rising high in the sky. Find his name, set him free.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_GhostClue_Swamp: Choking on swamp gas. Ruined timber, mouldy and splintered. Sinking moment by moment into bitter, bleak, mud. Find the name of the buried, set them free.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_GhostClue_Farm: Once it was homes, standing together. Now, nothing but ruins, falling apart. The last surviving memories trampled beneath angry hooves. Find the name of the forgotten, set him free.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_GhostClue_Memorial: Names to be remembered. Prayers for the dead. Whisper our memories at the place by the temple, so that we might finally rest.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_FarmGhost_1: I never liked goblins, even though Zanik said they deserved our pity, more than hate.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_FarmGhost_2: She was wrong, of course. They killed me. So I should hate them.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_FarmGhost_3: I came to rebuild a farmstead. Now I'll serve as nothing but compost. Gran would be so upset with me.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_FarmGhost_4: Remember me, adventurer. Help my spirit rest. Warren was my name, don't let it be forgotten.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_WindmillGhost_1: Well this didn't work out for me, did it? I made this great stupid journey, leaving Al Kharid behind, because adventure awaited me. Glory and fame.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_WindmillGhost_2: Then a great bloody dragon messed everything up.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_WindmillGhost_3: Dead within moments. Barely a day in this land. I never did have the best luck.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_WindmillGhost_4: Remember me, adventurer. I was Lazina, blade for hire and swordmaster supreme. Say a prayer for me, so that the gods will look on me fondly.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_CaveGhost_1: I thought I might be safe here, hidden away from the skies. As the dragon circled over me, I thought "maybe I'll be OK".
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_CaveGhost_3: He knew of this place, that dragon. Poked his great scaley head through the entrance and grinned at me as he slowly drew in a breath. I watched my life unfold before me, until the poison put it all to an end. I wish I'd found that shield.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_CaveGhost_4: Remember me, adventurer. Say a farewell to Finn, won't you? Tell ma I'm sorry, and tell my stepda he's an arse.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_Warren_Remembered: <The wind smells briefly of grass and soil. A contented feeling fills your heart>
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_Lazina_Remembered: <You hear the sound of laughter and the clash of blade against blade. You cannot help but smile>
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_Finn_Remembered: <You hear the sound of children playing and a woman laughing with them>
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_Kay_Remembered: <You smell sausages, bacon and the sizzling of eggs on the pan. Your stomach rumbles in response>
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_Everyone_Remembered: <The lost, the dead and the once forgotten, are finally laid to rest. A gentle peace washes over you and you are left with a gift from the dead.>
KeysToEntries.QuestDescription: Lay to rest the spirits of the lost expedition members.
KeysToEntries.WellFoundAmulet: The well contains cold, stagnant water.
KeysToEntries.WellNotFoundAmulet: You see something glinting in the bucket. Reaching into the cold water, you pull out a strange looking amulet that's even colder to the touch.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_SwampGhost_1: I'm impressed it got this far, really, this boat. Because I never sailed it here.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_SwampGhost_2: I tried to row out by the lake near the temple, when that dragon whacked me with his tail. What had I ever done to him?
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_SwampGhost_3: Hurtling through the air, knowing everything was over. All I could think about was how I'd missed breakfast. Most important meal of the day, and I forgot it on my last one.
KeysToEntries.MessageInABottle_SwampGhost_4: Names Kay, adventurer. Remember me, won't you? Give me a proper goodbye.
KeysToEntries.Altar_Warren_Remembered: The wind smells briefly of grass and soil. A contented feeling fills your heart.
KeysToEntries.Altar_Lazina_Remembered: You hear the sound of laughter and the clash of blade against blade. You cannot help but smile.
KeysToEntries.Altar_Finn_Remembered: You hear the sound of children playing and a woman laughing with them.
KeysToEntries.Altar_Kay_Remembered: You smell sausages, bacon and the sizzling of eggs on the pan. Your stomach rumbles in response.
KeysToEntries.Altar_All_Remembered: The lost, the dead and the once forgotten, are finally laid to rest. A gentle peace washes over you and you are left with a gift from the dead.
KeysToEntries.NotEnoughInventory: You do not have the space to receive your reward. You will need to make room in your backpack.
KeysToEntries.MoreGhostsLeft: The dead do not yet feel fully at peace. There may be more out that need help moving on.
KeysToEntries.Objective_FindUseForAmulet: Search for a purpose for the Amulet of Ghostspeak.
KeysToEntries.Objective_LayGhostsToRest: Find the restless spirits and help lay them to rest. They only appear at night.
KeysToEntries.AltarDescription: This shrine is a place where the dead are remembered. So that they may move on to the afterlife they deserve.
KeysToEntries.Amulet_ExtraHint: [You'll need to find some way to understand what they're saying.]
